About Me

Hi, if your here you want to know a little of my background...

Well I started my professional career in the mortgage industry. I was a mortgage broker for about 4 years and transitioned into a professional online poker player for the next 7 years until it got banned in the US for some ridiculous reasons. It was my passion as I have always enjoyed problem solving and self-improvement.

I stumbled upon programming by accident really, copy pasting some switch statement Javascript code from stack overflow which at the time, I didnt even know what the hell Javascript was. There are so many paths in programming, and each one can go so very deep and take years to be proficient, that I will never get bored. I was instantly hooked to say the least.

Rigo De La Torre
